segments.text: The woman is so completely engrossed in drying her plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She seems entirely cut off from everything else in the kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her back is mostly to the children, who are enacting their plan.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I am genuinely surprised by her profound unawareness.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Right behind her, the sink is overflowing dramatically onto the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And even closer, those two children are engaged in a risky cookie heist.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They are so bold to attempt this right in front of her, practically.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It almost makes me angry to see the potential for so much trouble.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy could fall, and the kitchen will be a soaked disaster area.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can one person be so thoroughly distracted from her surroundings?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a dangerous level of focus, given the circumstances.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: These kids are pushing their luck, and she's none the wiser.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I just can't believe she hasn't sensed any of it happening.
segments.speaker: PAR
